inklingMod:Surprise.NAME: Surprise!
inklingMod:Surprise.DESCRIPTION: inklingmod:Swim. NL When you resurface, apply !M! inklingmod:Ink to a random enemy.

inklingMod:AngleShooter.NAME: Angle Shooter
inklingMod:AngleShooter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice, or 3 times if the enemy has Block.

inklingMod:ToxicMist.NAME: Toxic Mist
inklingMod:ToxicMist.DESCRIPTION: Apply Weak !M! and Frail !M! to all enemies. NL Draw a card.
inklingMod:ToxicMist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Apply Weak !M! and Frail !M! to all enemies. NL Draw a card.

inklingMod:FizzyBomb.NAME: Fizzy Bomb
inklingMod:FizzyBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Repeat for X enemies total, chosen randomly.

inklingMod:SplattershotJr.NAME: Splattershot Jr.
inklingMod:SplattershotJr.DESCRIPTION: inklingmod:Weapon. Add 2 *Junior *Shots to your hand each turn.
inklingMod:SplattershotJr.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: inklingmod:Weapon. Add 2 *Junior *Shots+ to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:JuniorShot.NAME: Junior Shot
inklingMod:JuniorShot.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! inklingmod:Ink. Exhaust.

inklingMod:SplatBrella.NAME: Splat Brella
inklingMod:SplatBrella.DESCRIPTION: inklingmod:Weapon. Add a *Brella *Splash to your hand each turn.
inklingMod:SplatBrella.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: inklingmod:Weapon. Add a *Brella *Splash+ to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:BrellaSplash.NAME: Brella Splash
inklingMod:BrellaSplash.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! inklingmod:Ink. Gain !B! Block. Exhaust.

inklingMod:TriStringer.NAME: Tri-Stringer
inklingMod:TriStringer.DESCRIPTION: inklingmod:Weapon. Add 3 *Tri-Shots to your hand each turn.
inklingMod:TriStringer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: inklingmod:Weapon. Add 3 *Tri-Shots+ to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:TriShot.NAME: Tri-Shot
inklingMod:TriShot.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Ink. Exhaust.

inklingMod:DynamoRoller.NAME: Dynamo Roller
inklingMod:DynamoRoller.DESCRIPTION: inklingmod:Weapon. Add a *Dyna *Roll and *Dyna *Splash to your hand each turn.
inklingMod:DynamoRoller.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: inklingmod:Weapon. Add a *Dyna *Roll+ and *Dyna *Splash+ to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:DynaRoll.NAME: Dyna Roll
inklingMod:DynaRoll.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! inklingmod:Ink to all enemies. NL Draw a card. Exhaust.

inklingMod:DynaSplash.NAME: Dyna Splash
inklingMod:DynaSplash.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Exhaust.

inklingMod:Booyah.NAME: Booyah!
inklingMod:Booyah.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Booyah! into your discard pile. NL Draw !M! card.
inklingMod:Booyah.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Booyah! into your discard pile. NL Draw !M! cards.

inklingMod:NinjaSquid.NAME: Ninja Squid
inklingMod:NinjaSquid.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. While inklingmod:swimming, reduce all damage taken from attacks to 1.
inklingMod:NinjaSquid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: While inklingmod:swimming, reduce all damage taken from attacks to 1.

inklingMod:KillerWail5Point1.NAME: Killer Wail 5.1
inklingMod:KillerWail5Point1.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 6 times. Exhaust.

inklingMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
inklingMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

inklingMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
inklingMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
inklingMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

inklingMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
inklingMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

inklingMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
inklingMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !inklingMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

inklingMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
inklingMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !inklingMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
